properties.css: .media-stats-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 20px; padding: 20px; } .stat-item { text-align: center; } .stat-label { color: #888; font-size: 0.9em; margin-bottom: 5px; } .stat-value { font-size: 2em; font-weight: bold; color: #00ffff; text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 255, 255, 0.5); }

properties.title: Active Downloads
properties.content:
Loading...
0 MB/s--:--
properties.css: .download-list { padding: 15px; } .download-item { margin-bottom: 15px; } .download-name { color: #00ffff; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 0.9em; } .progress-bar { height: 8px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 4px; overflow: hidden; margin-bottom: 5px; } .progress-fill { height: 100%; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #00ffff, #ff00ff); transition: width 0.3s; } .download-stats { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: 0.8em; color: #888; } .speed { color: #00ff88; } .eta { color: #ffaa00; }

properties.title: Currently Streaming
properties.content:
No active streams
Start watching something!
----
properties.css: .streaming-grid { display: flex; gap: 20px; padding: 20px; overflow-x: auto; } .streaming-item { display: flex; gap: 15px; padding: 15px; background: rgba(0,255,255,0.1); border-radius: 10px; border: 1px solid rgba(0,255,255,0.3); min-width: 300px; } .user-avatar { width: 50px; height: 50px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00ffff, #ff00ff); border-radius: 50%; } .streaming-info { flex: 1; } .user-name { color: #00ffff; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; } .media-title { color: #fff; font-size: 0.9em; margin-bottom: 5px; } .streaming-stats { display: flex; gap: 15px; font-size: 0.8em; } .quality { color: #00ff88; } .bandwidth { color: #ffaa00; }

properties.title: Server Health
properties.content:
CPU
0%
RAM
0%
Temp
0°C
properties.css: .health-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 15px; padding: 20px; } .health-item { text-align: center; } .health-icon { width: 40px; height: 40px; margin: 0 auto 10px; border-radius: 50%; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00ffff, #ff00ff); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0,255,255,0.5); } .health-label { color: #888; font-size: 0.8em; margin-bottom: 5px; } .health-value { color: #00ff88; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: bold; }

properties.title: Recent Additions
properties.content:
Waiting for content...
Check back soon
properties.css: .additions-list { display: flex; gap: 15px; padding: 15px; overflow-x: auto; } .addition-item { display: flex; gap: 10px; min-width: 200px; } .addition-poster { width: 60px; height: 90px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff00ff, #00ffff); border-radius: 5px; flex-shrink: 0; } .addition-info { flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; } .addition-title { color: #fff; font-size: 0.9em; margin-bottom: 5px; } .addition-date { color: #888; font-size: 0.8em; }
